thread.title: Jie Zhang
thread.title_full: SmartBuyGlasses USA reviewed by Jie Zhang

author: Jie Zhang
title: Jie Zhang
text: I ordered my first progressive glasses here. The original prescription was poorly written which caused some confusion. I contacted the customer service and returned the glasses. They reprocess my order and made a new glasses for me. They responded to my questions every time within 24 hours. I am very happy with my new glasses now. I will definitely come back again. Thank you very much!
